Company: Borrego Springs Bank, Vavrinek, Trine, Day and Co.
Description of incident: The theft of seven laptop computers            from an auditing firm has led the Borrego Springs Bank to send warning            letters to all of its customers saying their personal financial information            may be in the hands of criminals. The bank would not comment on the            name of the accounting firm that was auditing the records or how or            where the thefts occurred. The computer files contain sensitive personal            financial information including account name, number and balance.
